answers.answer: You need to be tested to rule out diabetes.

question: So I hope sobody could help me, For a long time I have felt weird symptoms. As many as 4 years ago I can rember loseing vision in 1 eye for about 2 hours and then it came back? Never went to the doc because I was young and just shrugged it off.Recently I have had a bout of folliculitis on my scalp and I have been having tingles in my feet, hands and back. I also have been having some eye pain (usually at night). also for the first time in my life about a month ago I went through a 2 day period where I could not perfrom my "Duties" with my lady. Then it went back to normal as if nothing happen.I am 6'1 athletic, run every other day with no history in my family. I am going to the doc tom, but does this sound like diabetes to you??
title: Diabetes? with no risk factors
